content:
@Carol Macumber The HTA page for radlex at https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=79517464 says that the canonical URL for radlex is http://radlex.org/ but the FHIR specification itself says that radlex is http://www.radlex.org

Is this deliberate? Did HTA check? Is there a task to fix The FHIR spec (@Reuben Daniels)
Hi @Grahame Grieve , that hanging backslash needs to be removed. @Jessica Bota, I'm going to fix the HTA page, can you enter and start a UP ticket to do the same in THO.
